response.overview: Having a big dream is not a big thing but making that dream come true at any cost is a big task and Harsh’s life is all about this only - “SAPNE DEKHNA OR UNHE HAR HAL ME PURA KARNA”. But in real life when he decided to fulfill his life’s biggest dream,it came with a huge cost. This film is all about realistic journey of a DREAMER which is inspired by many real lives.
response.title: Dream City
